snippet: The video game Defiance and the television series of the same title were created in a collaboration between the Syfy network and Trion Worlds, a gaming company.
abstract: Chris Suellentrop discusses unusual collaboration between Syfy channel and Trion Worlds to produce Defiance, simultaneously created television show and video game; series and game are designed to be stand-alone pieces, but events in each will supposedly influence events in other.
lead_paragraph: The video game Defiance and the television series of the same title were created in a collaboration between the Syfy network and Trion Worlds, a gaming company.

headline.seo: ‘Defiance,’ Both a TV Series and a Video Game
headline.main: Same Story, Different Screens: A Video Game That’s Also a Series
headline.print_headline: Same Story, Different Screens: Video Game That’s Also a Series
